Face Tracking Addon

Face Tracking Addon

✦ 自然與可愛的表情型態鍵：巧妙呈現自然與可愛的角色情感變化。無論是微笑、抿嘴還是驚訝，都能真實呈現，讓使用者得以更加沉浸。

BlendShare

BlendShare is an Unity tool designed for creators who need to share blendshapes without distributing the original FBX files.
